channel.title: Mac on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Get mtr working on the Mac
item.description: Install Not sure why the brew doesn’t work as it used to, but here’s how to get it working: brew install mtr sudo ln /usr/local/Cellar/mtr/0.92/sbin/mtr /usr/local/bin/mtr sudo ln /usr/local/Cellar/mtr/0.92/sbin/mtr-packet /usr/local/bin/mtr-packet (If you don’t do the two symbolic links (ln) you’ll get mtr: command not found or mtr: Failure to start mtr-packet: Invalid argument) Run sudo mtr google.com
